message:
@Lars:  

Sorry for the delayed reply!  

I've tried the static checking against a runtime assembly (no project), and it works as I expect as long as that assembly has a CC assembly built as well (under Contracts\MyLibrary.Contracts.dll, if memory serves correctly).  

If you're having a specific problem with CC, a good source for answers is the MS forum for CC. The MS CC team members are very active and respond quickly to bug and feature requests.
